description.value:
[Addictive] Character gains Resistance(Psychic Powers) for Willpower Bonus Hours, if they already have this talent, they gain a further +10 to resist Psychic Powers. Whilst under the influence of the drug suffer -30 to all Perception Tests, Psykers taking this drug cannot Push their powers.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
